amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for Cuba democracy assistance programs by $36.7 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to decrease funding for the Department of State, Administration of Foreign Affairs by $36,700,000, and to increase funding for the Economic Support Fund by the same amount in order to address funding for Cuba Democracy assistance programs.

action.text: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Diaz-Balart, L..

vote.text: On agreeing to the Diaz-Balart, L. amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 254 - 170 (Roll no. 527).
